Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: it's `ack for wallets`, because I love ack: https://beyondgrep.com/

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: my next features to wack will be like nmap guessing your OS, I will guess the exact coin and version the wallet.dat came from. At first the problem seemed hard, but there are various tiny breadcrumbs left around the wallet.dat that actually allow you to tell which coin and which version of the coin the wallet.dat came from

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: once we can guess the coin a wallet.dat came from, we can go ask blockexplorers "how much funds does address X have, if any?" and sum it all up, so we can have an automated tool that can look thru many wallet.dat (maybe corrupt, maybe old backups, etc) and tell you "this is how much transparent funds are in each of these wallets?". Will only work for transparent funds, but that is a feature, not a bug üòÉ

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: it can already distinguish between ZEC/HUSH/KMD wallets
